definition: the quality of being poorly made or maintained
details:
noun
- the quality of being poorly made or maintained
= example: the quality of being poorly made or maintained
- the quality of being meager
= synonyms: leanness, meagerness, meagreness, scantiness, scantness, exiguity
- less than adequate
= example: less than adequate
- the state of having little or no money and few or no material possessions
= synonyms: impoverishment
